txt_en: We should consider every day lost on which we have not danced at least once.
txt_cn: 每个不曾起舞的日子，都是对生命的辜负。

txt_en: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
txt_cn: 所有你乐于挥霍的时间都不算浪费。

txt_en: It's not whether you win or lose, it's how you play the game.
txt_cn: 重要的不是输赢，而是你如何比赛。

txt_en: You can cut all the flowers, but you cannot keep spring from coming.
txt_cn: 你能剪掉所有的鲜花，但你不能阻止春天的到来。

txt_en: It's good to dream, but it's also good to wake up again and see the world as it truly is.
txt_cn: 有梦想是好事，但也要懂得什么时候该醒来， 看清世界真实的样子。

txt_en: Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.
txt_cn: 胜利并非一切，求胜的执念才是。
永恒由无数个此刻组成。

txt_en: I opened myself to the gentle indifference of the world.
txt_cn: 向这个冷漠而未温情尽失的世界敞开我的心扉。

txt_en: You're not obligated to win. You're obligated to keep trying to do the best you can every day.
txt_cn: 你不必非要赢，但有责任每天全力以赴、持续精进。

txt_en: The best time to be happy is always now.
txt_cn: 幸福的最佳时机永远是现在。
